name: 陳貞光
objective: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
schedule:
w1 - Review the 3 Laws and auxiliary functions
w2/3/4- Behavior of Gases - Chap.8
w5/6/7- Behavior of Solutions - Chap.9
w9 - midterm
w8/10- Gibbs Free Energy Composition and Phase Diagrams - Chap.10
w11/12- Reactions Involving Gases - Chap.11
w13/14- Reactions Involving Pure Condensed Phases and a Gaseous Phase - Chap.12
w15/16- Reaction Involving Equilibria in Systems Containing Components in Condensed Solution - Chap.13
w17 -Phase Diagrams for binary Systems in Pressure-Temperature-Composition Space - Chap.14
w18- Final Exam.
scorePolicy: 30% Midterm, 30% Final Exam, 40% Class performance and Assignment
materials:
Textbook: Introduction to the Thermodynamics of Materials, 5th Ed., by David R. Gaskell, Taylor & Francis, c.2008.
中文參考書：材料熱力學，編譯：蔡希杰，偉明圖書，c.2003.
原著：David R. Gaskell, 3rd Ed.
